[[Wikipedia:Southmead|Southmead]]The Enchanted World of Peter Pracownik - Biography,[[wikipedia:Bristol|Bristol]], [[wikipedia:England|England]][https://web.archive.org/web/20180426100700/http://www.peterpracownik.com/pages/biography.html Biography - Peter Pracownik] | died=August 15,[https://seattlein2025.org/memberships/in-memoriam/ Seattle Worldcon - In Memorial] 2024[https://glastonbury.nub.news/news/local-news/glastonbury-mourns-the-loss-of-artist-peter-pracownik-whose-work-captured-the-towns-mystical-spirit-237785 Glastonbury mourns the loss of artist Peter Pracownik, whose work captured the town's mystical spirit] | education=[[wikipedia:List_of_schools_in_Somerset#Primary and first schools|St. Joseph's Roman Catholic Primary School]]
[[Wikipedia:Bridgwater and Taunton College|Taunton College of Art]] | style=New Age/Fantasy | images=[[:Category:Images by Peter Pracownik|Gallery]] | location=[[wikipedia:North_Cornwall|North Cornwall]] | website=[https://web.archive.org/web/20180426100649/http://www.peterpracownik.com/index.html peterpracownik.com] }} '''Peter Pracownik''' ([[19 October]], [[1951]] - [[August 15]], [[2024]]) was a New Age / Fantasy artist and sculptor who was born in [[wikipedia:Bristol|Bristol]], [[wikipedia:England|England]] and lived most of his life in [[wikipedia:Glastonbury|Glastonbury]], before moving to [[wikipedia:North_Cornwall|North Cornwall]] later in life. He was an active artist for over 30 years since his professional debut in 1989, providing art for collectible cards, posters and music album covers. In [[1997]], Pracownik created illustrations for the [[The Lord of the Rings Tarot|Lord of the Rings Tarot Deck & Card Game]] along with artist Terry Donaldson and Mike Fitzgerald. In [[2012]], Donaldson and Pracownik collaborated again on [[The Hobbit Tarot]]. He was commisioned to create a Lord Of The Rings poster for Wizard and Genius. Pracownik had two children with his first wife, Julie: Rebecca and Oisin.The Enchanted World of Peter Pracownik - Dedication Peter and Julie separated in 1991. He married artist Nicola-Claire Lydon in 2010[https://www.flickr.com/photos/raggedyrags/5063995277 Bespoke bridal outfit made for Nicola and peter wedding] and they co-owned the Another Green World art gallery and store.[https://web.archive.org/web/20120915002447/http://www.peterpracownik.com/pages/about.htm About - Peter Pracownik and Another Green World] ==Gallery== File:Peter Pracownik & Nicola-Claire Lydon.jpg|Peter Pracownik & Nicola-Claire Lydon File:Pracownik & Lydon.jpg|Nicola-Claire Lydon & Peter Pracownik ==See also== *[[:Category:Images by Peter Pracownik|Images by Peter Pracownik]] *[[:Category:Images by Peter Pracownik|Images of Peter Pracownik]] ==External links== *"[https://web.archive.org/web/20211225022107/http://www.peterpracownik.com/ Official Website]" *"[http://news.bbc.co.uk/local/cornwall/hi/people_and_places/newsid_9183000/9183706.stm Cornwall's Rock Artist Peter Pracownik]" via [[BBC]] {{References}} [[Category:Artists|Pracownik, Peter]]
